title: RR CDG+MP3 Karaoke Collection Vol 6 (20 GB RAR Archive)
description:
OK Gang 1GByte upload speed seed box now helping out, CDG+MP3 Karaoke, Audio 128 or better (mostly better).

Each RAR Archive contains approx 500 songs or 5000 to each torrent.   This is a 20 Gigabyte download.  Please do NOT join this swarm if you do not know how to download at 1 megabit (1 megabit per second = 130 KB/s) speeds or above.  My maximum speed to you is 13.8 megabits per second/the number of active peers downloading in the swarm.   

PLEASE ONLY DOWNLOAD 1 torrent at a time from this series.  Overloading your torrent client with too many active torrents is the most common reason for poor download speeds in these swarms. 

Each torrent contains plain text files which you can download on there own to look at each RAR Archive's contents.

All files are renamed following best industry practise in the naming of Music files and can be imported into any professional playout software, or free media player if it takes .CDG graphics files, Tested with WinAMP and VLC OK.  Vol 7 will be along once this torrent is well seeded by you all.

I have not got the upload bandwidth to seed the existing ones in this series while I am getting a new torrent out there, so I do need you help, for which I thank you.

Rigmar Radio - Rockin' the Free World since 1967
